function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risks of ozone disinfection in wastewater treatment, including high operation costs and hazardous byproducts with chemical reactions. Ozone over-dose can cause bad smell and secondary pollution.","Impact":"Increased operation costs, hazardous byproducts affecting human health, and potential for secondary pollution.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and control of ozone dosage, proper disposal of hazardous byproducts, and ensuring efficient ventilation to prevent secondary pollution.","Technologies":"Ozone monitoring and control systems, proper disposal methods for hazardous byproducts, and effective ventilation systems.","People":"Operators, maintenance personnel, and public in the vicinity of the wastewater treatment system.","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facility management and environmental regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Potential risks of using UV light in disinfection, including human exposure to hazardous UV radiation and incomplete disinfection of wastewater.","Impact":"Increased risk of UV-induced health issues and potential for incomplete disinfection, leading to waterborne disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementation of safety protocols to minimize human exposure to UV radiation and regular maintenance of UV disinfection systems to ensure effectiveness.","Technologies":"UV radiation shielding for protection, safety training for personnel, and regular inspection and maintenance of UV systems.","People":"Operators, maintenance personnel, and public in the vicinity of the wastewater treatment system.","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facility management and environmental regulatory authorities."}]}
